thread.title: BroadPoint Announces Major Acquisition to Benefit Nonprofit Community

author: cnbc.com
title: BroadPoint Announces Major Acquisition to Benefit Nonprofit Community
text:
BETHESDA, Md., March 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Today, BroadPoint , an award-winning business and technology consulting firm specializing in Microsoft Dynamics for nonprofits including ERP, CRM, and membership solutions, announced the acquisition of The Jitasa Group's Technology Solutions (TS) division.
The merger of these two highly respected partners provides the nonprofit community with a single, trusted source for their technology solutions, services and support. Both companies are excited about the expanded opportunities the acquisition brings to nonprofits.
Formerly AVF Consulting, before being acquired by The Jitasa Group in 2016, Jitasa's TS division has delivered accounting and business management solutions to the nonprofit community for over 25 years. They specialize in implementation, training, and support services for Microsoft Dynamics NAV-based products, including Serenic Navigator, a robust accounting solution designed for nonprofits. Jitasa Founder and CEO, Jeff Russell, believes the union will help the nonprofit sector. He stated, "BroadPoint's excellent reputation as one of the leading providers of Microsoft Dynamics for hundreds of nonprofit organizations was a perfect fit for us. They've been helping nonprofits for nearly two decades and have proven their continued dedication to this industry."
When asked about the acquisition, BroadPoint CEO, Lee Raesly, stated, "Jitasa's technology practice brings years of nonprofit experience that complements our own talent and industry focus. The acquisition benefits our nonprofit clients with a larger team and deeper consulting and technical expertise in Serenic Navigator and Microsoft Dynamics NAV."
This expansion is part of a long-term growth initiative to broaden BroadPoint's footprint in the nonprofit sector. Adds Raesly, "The move adds a marquee list of nonprofit clients for us and jumpstarts our ability to deliver Microsoft's new cloud-based ERP software, Dynamics 365 Business Central, which is based on the Microsoft Dynamics NAV platform. We feel honored to help nonprofits simplify and improve processes so they can focus on driving their missions."
About BroadPoint
BroadPoint, Inc. is one of the largest Gold-Certified Microsoft Dynamics partners in the U.S. and the leading provider of Microsoft Dynamics solutions to associations and nonprofit organizations. For nearly 20 years, the team of over 100 experienced CPAs, MBAs, PMPs, and certified technology experts has remained focused on helping clients spend more time on their mission and less time on technology. Through this commitment, BroadPoint has become the partner nonprofits trust for deep industry knowledge, relevant solutions and personal service. For more information about BroadPoint, visit www.broadpoint.net .
About Jitasa
Jitasa, meaning "the spirit of serving others," is a Thai word. Jitasa is a Certified B Corp and a signatory to the United Nations Global Compact that partners with nonprofits and NGOs to make the world a better place. The company is the largest U.S. accounting and bookkeeping solutions provider dedicated to the social sector and serves more than 600 organizations in 44 U.S. states that help millions of people and thousands of causes worldwide. Founded in 2008 and based in Boise, Idaho, Jitasa employs 175 "number crunchers with a purpose" worldwide. Visit www.jitasagroup.com for more information.
